mapper.select: SELECT BA_NO, b.MEM_NO, BA_TYPE, BA_TITLE, BA_CONTENT, BA_COUNT, BA_DATE , m.MEM_ID, m.MEM_NAME, m.MEM_BLACK FROM BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO ORDER BY BA_DATE

SELECT BA_NO, b.MEM_NO, BA_TYPE, BA_TITLE, BA_CONTENT, BA_COUNT, BA_DATE , m.MEM_ID, m.MEM_NAME, m.MEM_BLACK FROM BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO WHERE m.MEM_ID LIKE '% #{memId} %' ORDER BY BA_DATE

SELECT BA_NO, b.MEM_NO, BA_TYPE, BA_TITLE, BA_CONTENT, BA_COUNT, BA_DATE , m.MEM_ID, m.MEM_NAME, m.MEM_BLACK FROM BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO WHERE m.MEM_NAME LIKE '% #{memName} %' ORDER BY BA_DATE

SELECT BA_NO, b.MEM_NO, BA_TYPE, BA_TITLE, BA_CONTENT, BA_COUNT, BA_DATE , m.MEM_ID, m.MEM_NAME, m.MEM_BLACK FROM BOARD b LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO WHERE BA_TITLE LIKE '% #{baTitle} %' ORDER BY BA_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BA_NO, MEM_NO, BA_TYPE, BA_TITLE, BA_CONTENT, BA_COUNT, BA_DATE ) VALUES ( BA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memNo}, #{baType}, #{baTitle}, #{baContent}, #{baCount}, #{baDate} )
